events.message: Customer reported a car collision on highway resulting in moderate vehicle damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the auto accident claim and coordinate next steps.
The customer was promptly informed that the claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
Customer requested to submit accident photographs, police report, and vehicle registration documents.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and official police report.
The investigation team began assessing the submitted materials and inspecting the vehicle damage.
Investigation finalized with confirmation that the accident circumstances meet policy coverage terms.
A settlement proposal was sent to the customer outlining approved compensation for vehicle repairs.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and communication clarity.
The claim was officially approved and scheduled for payment processing to cover damages.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover all approved auto accident repair costs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after successful settlement and payment disbursal.
All case files and documentation related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
